<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<policies>
  <inbound>
    <choose>
      <!-- Match either /healthz or /portalpay/healthz using OriginalUrl.Path to be robust -->
      <when condition='@(context.Request.OriginalUrl.Path.ToLower().Contains("/healthz"))'>
        <return-response>
          <set-status code="200" reason="OK" />
          <set-header name="Content-Type" exists-action="override">
            <value>application/json</value>
          </set-header>
          <set-body>{"status":"ok"}</set-body>
        </return-response>
      </when>
    </choose>
  </inbound>
  <backend></backend>
  <outbound></outbound>
  <on-error></on-error>
</policies>
